description: Index of 4^n within sequence of numbers of form 4^i*6^j.
comments: First differs from A025709 at a(84).
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = n + 1 + Sum(j= 1 .. n, floor(j*log[6](4))). - _Robert Israel_, May 10 2015
maple: N:= 200: # to get a(0) to a(N)[$1..N+1] + ListTools:-PartialSums([seq(floor(j*log[6](4)),j=0..N)]); # _Robert Israel_, May 10 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Edited and offset corrected by _Robert Israel_, May 10 2015
